title: "Type 2 diabetes may speed up brain aging, cognitive decline"
excerpt: "A large-scale study suggests that type 2 diabetes also accelerates cognitive decline and brain aging. Early diagnosis and control of type 2 diabetes is key to reducing these cognitive effects."
